${ModID}:Leprechaun.NAME: Leprechaun
${ModID}:Leprechaun.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 生成 a ${ModID}:Leprechaun。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Dice increase the damage or #y格挡 of the next card you play that deals damage or #y格挡s。
Jinxed enemies 失去 生命 每当 they are debuffed。

${ModID}:Porcupine.NAME: Porcupine
${ModID}:Porcupine.DESCRIPTION: 生成 a ${ModID}:Porcupine. NL Add !M! *Quills into your hand。

${ModID}:Wolves.NAME: Wolves
${ModID}:Wolves.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 生成 a ${ModID}:Wolf。

${ModID}:Elephant.NAME: Elephant
${ModID}:Elephant.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 受到 !M!  点伤害。
${ModID}:Elephant.FLAVOR: This is my favorite card.  I hope you like it。

${ModID}:FireSpirit.NAME: Fire Spirit
${ModID}:FireSpirit.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 生成 a ${ModID}:Fire Spirit。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ignited creatures 失去 #b1 生命 per stack at the start of their turn。

${ModID}:RainbowLouse.NAME: Rainbow Louse
${ModID}:RainbowLouse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 生成 a ${ModID}:Rainbow Louse. NL 抽一张牌。
${ModID}:RainbowLouse.FLAVOR: The result of an unwise magic experiment。

${ModID}:SwarmOfBees.NAME: Swarm of Bees
${ModID}:SwarmOfBees.DESCRIPTION: 对所有敌人造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 生成 a ${ModID}:Swarm of Bees。

${ModID}:Training.NAME: Training
${ModID}:Training.DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时 Evoke your next orb !M! times。
${ModID}:Training.FLAVOR: It isn't just about what you can summon, but how effectively you can direct them。

${ModID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${ModID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you 生成 an Orb, Evoke it without removing it。
${ModID}:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 每当 you 生成 an Orb, Evoke it without removing it。
${ModID}:Ambush.FLAVOR: I couldn't find good ambush art so have a pun。

${ModID}:Quill.NAME: Quill
${ModID}:Quill.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 消耗 。
